content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **gauge ** no gauge is listed in the pattern **materials** *per rabbit* - double yarn amounts to make both * japanese size 7/0 4 0 mm hook * approx 100 5 meters color a yuttari acrylic * scraps of colors b and c yuttari acrylic * scraps of pierrot kirakira long fur or appropriate fun fur *for the bride rabbit only* includes directions for amigurumi bride and groom rabbits if you just want plain rabbits you can leave off the wedding accoutrements 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/27-528w/
